venue.name: John Harvard's Restaurant and Brew House

item.description:
Join the CTNites.com VIP Entertainment Club for Dinner and a Great Night of Comedy at John Harvard's Restaurant and Brew House on Thursday, March 27 at 7:30 pm

You know that John Harvard's has great food, now we are bringing Comedy there to combine together for the Ultimate Dining and Entertainment Experience!

Enjoy a sit down 3-course meal with:

Soup of the day
House Salad
Soda, Coffee, or Tea with FREE refills

Your Choice Of Entrée:

Chicken Potpie Dinner
Meatloaf Dinner with mashed potatoes and asparagus
Backwoods Grilled Chicken Sandwich with fries
Fish and Chips with fries and coleslaw
½ pound Yankee Burger with cheese, BBQ sauce, bacon and fries
½ pound Lafayette Burger with Mushrooms and fries
Garden Veggie Burger with Mushrooms and fries

All Burgers and Sandwiches come with lettuce, tomato, onions, and pickles

Dinner starts at 7:30 pm. After dinner, stay seated for the Comedy Show featuring 3 Professional Comedians! You will have great seats to enjoy this show after dinner, and sample John Harvard's fresh brewed beer, drink specials, or anything else from their full bar.

ALL COMEDY NIGHT TICKETS ARE RESERVED FOR THE CTNITES.COM VIP CLUB

John Harvard's Restaurant and Brew House
1487 Pleasant Valley Road
Manchester, CT 06040
Across from Buckland Hills Mall
http://www.JohnHarvar...


Tickets are $25 online or $35 at the door and include:
3 course dinner, soda, coffee, tea with refills, and the Comedy Show

All major credit cards accepted, click on PayPal to pay by credit card

This is going to be a great event and we have limited seating, so buy your ticket today to reserve your seat, and save $10 per ticket.

The CTNites.com VIP Entertainment Club will arrive at 7:00 and have tickets available for $35 (cash only) until 7:30 pm when dinner starts.

Buy your tickets online. We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover, Debit Cards, and PayPal. Please print your online ticket receipt for proof of purchase

For more information, call (860) 436-9449 or visit http://www.CTNites.co...

item.name: Thurs March 27 Dinner & Comedy Night At John Harvard's Restaurant and Brew House
